strapiPost.title: Advice For Families Navigating The Maze Of Kids' Sports
strapiPost.content:
There are many amazing opportunities in NWA for children’s Involvement in sports, but how do parents and families not get overwhelmed with all the scheduling? I am Northwest Arkansas sat down with Brandi K. Harris to discuss that and more. 

  • Expertise: Brandi K. Harris is a marriage and family therapist here in NWA, and she also has a background as a D1 athlete and has coached swimming with USA Swimming for over a decade. 
  • Family health: Brandi shared valuable advice on how to take care of yourself while scheduling and supporting your child’s sports activities.  

Listen to the podcast episode or read the transcript HERE.
